sentences: He began DJing as a teenager in the 1980s around his native Essex and Suffolk.
This was before he got his break DJing on the London acid house and rave scene.
He started working as a recording artist and producer for his own style of music and other genres in 1990.
One of his early remixes was a bootleg mix of Orbital's Chime in 1990, which was then officially released in 1992.
Ray set up Dread Recordings in 1994 and has produced numerous albums.
